customInstructions: When working with this project, the main codebase is in the iptv/ directory. Use TypeScript for any code changes in iptv/. Always run tests with 'npm test' before completing tasks. Validate playlists with 'npm run playlist:validate' and 'npm run playlist:lint' after any playlist-related changes. This project is part of the iptv-org ecosystem - maintain compatibility with related repositories (iptv-org/database, iptv-org/api, iptv-org/epg). Follow strict TypeScript standards and ESM module syntax.
